mapper.delete: delete from database_evaluation where id = #{id} and s_id = #{sid}
mapper.select: select de.id, de.s_id, de.d_id, de.vyear, de.order_type, de.result_type,de.remark, dbi.data_time, dbi.company_id, dbi.agent_id, dbi.fulltext_flag from database_evaluation de left join database_base_info dbi on de.d_id = dbi.d_id and de.s_id = dbi.s_id where de.id = #{id}
select id,vyear as vYear,result_type,time,remark from database_evaluation where s_id = #{sid} and d_id = #{did} order by vyear desc
